割賦購買: (かっぷこうばい) - buying in installments; buying in instalments
割込: (わりこみ) - queue jumping/breaking into a line/muscling in on/wedging oneself in/interruption/sharing a theater box (theatre); interrupt
割込み: (わりこみ) - queue jumping/breaking into a line/muscling in on/wedging oneself in/interruption/sharing a theater box (theatre); interrupt
割込みレジスタ: (わりこみレジスタ) - interrupt register
割込む: (わりこむ) - to cut in; to thrust oneself into; to wedge oneself in; to muscle in on; to interrupt; to disturb
割高: (わりだか) - comparatively high; fairly expensive
割鶏牛刀: (かっけいぎゅうとう) - using a meat ax when a knife would suffice; taking a sledgehammer to crack a nut; using a grand-scale measure (a massive instrument) to deal with an insignificant problem
割麦: (わりむぎ) - ground barley; cracked barley
剴切: (がいせつ) - appropriateness; adequacy; aptness; relevance
創める: (はじめる) - to start/to begin/to commence/to initiate/to originate; to open (e.g. a store)/to start up/to establish (business. etc.); (after the -masu stem of a verb)  to start .../to begin to ...
創り出す: (つくりだす) - to manufacture/to produce/to raise (crops); to invent/to dream up/to create
創る: (つくる) - (造る usu. for large-scale building, manufacturing, etc. 創る usu. for creating) to make/to produce/to manufacture/to build/to construct; to prepare (food)/to brew (alcohol); to raise/to grow/to cultivate/to train; to till; to draw up (a document)/to make out/to prepare/to write; to create (an artistic work, etc.)/to compose; to coin (a phrase)/to organize/to organise/to establish/to found; to have (a child); to make up (one's face, etc.); to fabricate (an excuse, etc.); to form (a line, etc.); to set (a record); to commit (a sin, etc.)
創世記: (そうせいき) - Genesis (book of the Bible)
創作: (sousaku) - creation, production, creative work (romance, filme, etc.), original work, (creative) writing; fabrication, fiction, invention
創作力: (そうさくりょく) - creative power; genius; creative originality
創作意欲: (そうさくいよく) - (yoji) will (urge) to create; creative urge; appetite for writing
創作料理: (そうさくりょうり) - creative cookery; creative cuisine
創作権: (そうさくけん) - rights of authorship
創価学会: (そうかがっかい) - Soka Gakkai (lay organization, based on Nichiren Buddhism) (organisation)
創始者効果: (そうししゃこうか) - founder effect
創建記念日: (そうけんきねんび) - foundation anniversary
創意工夫: (そういくふう) - (yoji) being imaginative and creative; creative originality
創意工夫功労者賞: (そういくふうこうろうしゃしょう) - Prize for Creativity
創意工夫育成功労学校賞: (そういくふういくせいこうろうがっこうしょう) - Prize to Schools for Nurturing Creativity
創業: (そうぎょう) - establishment (of a business, etc.)
創業は易く守成は難し: (そうぎょうはやすくしゅせいはかたし) - It is easy to start an enterprise but difficult to maintain it
創業守成: (そうぎょうしゅせい) - (yoji) starting an enterprise and (or) carrying it to final success
創氏改名: (そうしかいめい) - (yoji) the order forced on Koreans to change their names to Japanese ones
創発: (そうはつ) - emergence (in evolutionary theory, systems theory, etc.)
創立: (そうりつ) - establishment; founding; organization; organisation
創立者: (そうりつしゃ) - founder; organizer; organiser
創立記念日: (そうりつきねんび) - anniversary of the establishment of
創設: (そうせつ) - establishment; founding; organization; organisation
創造力: (そうぞうりょく) - creative power; creativity
創造的進化: (そうぞうてきしんか) - creative evolution (as proposed by Henri Bergson)
創部: (そうぶ) - establishing a club (at a school, college, etc.); establishing a division (in a company)
創面: (そうめん) - surface of a wound
剽げる: (ひょうげる) - to jest; to joke
剽悍無比: (ひょうかんむひ) - (yoji) as fierce and nimble as any; daring and agile without equal
剽軽る: (ひょうげる) - to jest; to joke
剿討: (そうとう) - cleaning up; sweeping up; mopping up
劃す: (かくす) - to draw (a line); to demarcate/to mark/to divide/to map out; to plan
